editor.label: Application Server - IIS7 AddWebSiteBinding
editor.description: Adds a binding to a Website.

formElement.label: Website name:
formElement.documentation: The name of the Website to add a binding, i.e: 'Default Web Site'. (Required)

formElement.label: Binding protocol:
formElement.documentation: Protocol of the binding to add, i.e: 'http'. (Required)

formElement.label: Binding information:
formElement.documentation: Information of the binding to add, including the host and the port, i.e: 'localhost:443', '*:81'. (Required)
